name: Chaos: Data Inconsistencies
description: Stock data has inconsistencies - negative prices, null values, and invalid data.
challenges: One stock has extremely large price (overflow potential)
interviewer_notes: Ask candidate to make their price alerts robust against bad data. Their code should handle edge cases gracefully.
interviewer_prompt: Great job implementing the basic feature! Now, we've discovered that our stock data feed sometimes has issues - negative prices, missing values, etc. Can you update your implementation to handle these edge cases gracefully? The alerts should not crash or produce incorrect results when encountering bad data.
